title: Demon

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Attack during your combat phase.
- Block during your opponents' combat phases.
- At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice another creature. If you can't, this creature deals 6 damage to you.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Flying *(This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying and/or reach.*)
- Trample *(This creature can deal excess combat damage to a player or planeswalker it's attacking.)*
- Black

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who would oppose you.

desc:
